attributes.action: purchase X amount of properties in London for MP’s,   who require to be there to carry out their parliamentary duties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As and when new MP’s are voted into their constituency they can then hand over the house that comes with the position, therefore reducing the need for such high expense claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
